biomni.tool.literature.name: fetch_supplementary_info_from_doi
biomni.tool.literature.description: Fetches supplementary information for a paper given its DOI and saves it to a specified directory.

required_parameters.name: doi
required_parameters.description: The paper DOI

optional_parameters.name: output_dir
optional_parameters.description: Directory to save supplementary files

biomni.tool.literature.name: extract_url_content
biomni.tool.literature.description: Extract the text content of a webpage using requests and BeautifulSoup.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: Webpage URL to extract content from

biomni.tool.literature.name: extract_pdf_content
biomni.tool.literature.description: Extract text content from a PDF file.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: URL of the PDF file

biomni.tool.literature.name: advanced_web_search
biomni.tool.literature.description:
Initiate an advanced web search by launching a specialized agent to collect relevant information and citations through multiple rounds of web searches for a given query.
Craft the query carefully for the search agent to find the most relevant information.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The query string that you want the agent to search for. May contain additional context or guidelines for the agent to follow.

optional_parameters.name: max_searches
optional_parameters.description: The max number of searches the agent may issue inside this request. The higher number of searches, the longer the returned results will be. You may tune this number based on the complexity of the query.

optional_parameters.name: max_retries
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of retry attempts with exponential backoff.

biomni.tool.genomics.name: get_rna_seq_archs4
biomni.tool.genomics.description: Given a gene name, fetch RNA-seq expression data showing the top K tissues with highest transcripts-per-million (TPM) values.

required_parameters.name: gene_name
required_parameters.description: The gene name for which RNA-seq data is being fetched

optional_parameters.name: K
optional_parameters.description: The number of tissues to return

biomni.tool.genomics.name: get_gene_set_enrichment_analysis_supported_database_list
biomni.tool.genomics.description: Returns a list of supported databases for gene set enrichment analysis.

biomni.tool.genomics.name: gene_set_enrichment_analysis
biomni.tool.genomics.description: Perform enrichment analysis for a list of genes, with optional background gene set and plotting functionality.

required_parameters.name: genes
required_parameters.description: List of gene symbols to analyze

optional_parameters.name: top_k
optional_parameters.description: Number of top pathways to return

optional_parameters.name: database
optional_parameters.description: Database to use for enrichment analysis (e.g., pathway, transcription, ontology)

optional_parameters.name: background_list
optional_parameters.description: List of background genes to use for enrichment analysis

optional_parameters.name: plot
optional_parameters.description: Generate a bar plot of the top K enrichment results

biomni.tool.support_tools.name: run_python_repl
biomni.tool.support_tools.description: Executes the provided Python command in the notebook environment and returns the output.

required_parameters.name: command
required_parameters.description: Python command to execute in the notebook environment

biomni.tool.support_tools.name: read_function_source_code
biomni.tool.support_tools.description: Read the source code of a function from any module path.

required_parameters.name: function_name
required_parameters.description: Fully qualified function name (e.g., 'bioagentos.tool.support_tools.write_python_code')

biomni.tool.database.name: query_uniprot
biomni.tool.database.description: Query the UniProt REST API using either natural language or a direct endpoint.

required_parameters.name: prompt
required_parameters.description: Natural language query about proteins (e.g., "Find information about human insulin")

optional_parameters.name: endpoint
optional_parameters.description: Full or partial UniProt API endpoint URL to query directly (e.g., "https://rest.uniprot.org/uniprotkb/P01308")

optional_parameters.name: api_key
optional_parameters.description: Anthropic API key. If None, will use ANTHROPIC_API_KEY env variable

optional_parameters.name: model
optional_parameters.description: Anthropic model to use for natural language processing

optional_parameters.name: max_results
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

biomni.tool.database.name: query_alphafold
biomni.tool.database.description: Query the AlphaFold Database API for protein structure predictions.

required_parameters.name: uniprot_id
required_parameters.description: UniProt accession ID (e.g., "P12345")

optional_parameters.name: endpoint
optional_parameters.description: Specific AlphaFold API endpoint to query: "prediction", "summary", or "annotations"

optional_parameters.name: residue_range
optional_parameters.description: Specific residue range in format "start-end" (e.g., "1-100")

optional_parameters.name: download
optional_parameters.description: Whether to download structure files

optional_parameters.name: output_dir
optional_parameters.description: Directory to save downloaded files

optional_parameters.name: file_format
optional_parameters.description: Format of the structure file to download - "pdb" or "cif"

optional_parameters.name: model_version
optional_parameters.description: AlphaFold model version - "v4" (latest) or "v3", "v2", "v1"

optional_parameters.name: model_number
optional_parameters.description: Model number (1-5, with 1 being the highest confidence model)

biomni.tool.database.name: query_interpro
biomni.tool.database.description: Query the InterPro REST API using natural language or a direct endpoint.

required_parameters.name: prompt
required_parameters.description: Natural language query about protein domains or families

optional_parameters.name: endpoint
optional_parameters.description: Direct endpoint path or full URL (e.g., '/entry/interpro/IPR023411')

optional_parameters.name: api_key
optional_parameters.description: Anthropic API key. If None, will use ANTHROPIC_API_KEY env variable

optional_parameters.name: model
optional_parameters.description: Anthropic model to use

optional_parameters.name: max_results
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return per page

biomni.tool.database.name: query_pdb
biomni.tool.database.description: Query the RCSB PDB database using natural language or a direct structured query.

required_parameters.name: prompt
required_parameters.description: Natural language query about protein structures

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: Direct structured query in RCSB Search API format (overrides prompt)

optional_parameters.name: api_key
optional_parameters.description: Anthropic API key. If None, will use ANTHROPIC_API_KEY env variable

optional_parameters.name: model
optional_parameters.description: Anthropic model to use for natural language processing

optional_parameters.name: max_results
optional_parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

biomni.tool.database.name: query_pdb_identifiers
biomni.tool.database.description: Retrieve detailed data and/or download files for PDB identifiers.

required_parameters.name: identifiers
required_parameters.description: List of PDB identifiers to query

optional_parameters.name: return_type
optional_parameters.description: Type of results: 'entry', 'assembly', 'polymer_entity', etc.

optional_parameters.name: download
optional_parameters.description: Whether to download PDB structure files

optional_parameters.name: attributes
optional_parameters.description: List of specific attributes to retrieve

biomni.tool.database.name: query_kegg
biomni.tool.database.description: Take a natural language prompt and convert it to a structured KEGG API query.

required_parameters.name: prompt
required_parameters.description: Natural language query about KEGG data (e.g., "Find human pathways related to glycolysis")

optional_parameters.name: endpoint
optional_parameters.description: Direct KEGG API endpoint to query

optional_parameters.name: api_key
optional_parameters.description: Anthropic API key. If None, will look for ANTHROPIC_API_KEY environment variable

optional_parameters.name: model
optional_parameters.description: Anthropic model to use

optional_parameters.name: verbose
optional_parameters.description: Whether to return detailed API response information

biomni.tool.database.name: query_stringdb
biomni.tool.database.description: Query the STRING protein interaction database using natural language or direct endpoint.

required_parameters.name: prompt
required_parameters.description: Natural language query about protein interactions

optional_parameters.name: endpoint
optional_parameters.description: Full URL to query directly (overrides prompt)

optional_parameters.name: api_key
optional_parameters.description: Anthropic API key. If None, will use ANTHROPIC_API_KEY env variable

optional_parameters.name: model
optional_parameters.description: Anthropic model to use for natural language processing

optional_parameters.name: download_image
optional_parameters.description: Whether to download image results (for image endpoints)

optional_parameters.name: output_dir
optional_parameters.description: Directory to save downloaded files

optional_parameters.name: verbose
optional_parameters.description: Whether to return detailed response information

optional_parameters.name: assembly
optional_parameters.description: Assembly of the genome, formatted like 'GRCh38'

biomni.tool.database.description: Given a cCRE (Candidate cis-Regulatory Element), return the k nearest genes sorted by distance.

required_parameters.description: Assembly of the gene, e.g., 'GRCh38'

required_parameters.name: chromosome
required_parameters.description: Chromosome of the gene, e.g., 'chr12'

optional_parameters.name: k
optional_parameters.description: Number of nearby genes to return, sorted by distance
